## IConnection interface

Describes the properties of a physical connection that was established between the system and a Jabra device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface IConnection 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [hidChannel](./jabra-js.iconnection.hidchannel.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [IHidChannel](./jabra-js.ihidchannel.md) | The [IHidChannel](./jabra-js.ihidchannel.md) object that should be used to communicate with the device when using ths connection. |
|  [id](./jabra-js.iconnection.id.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [IConnectionId](./jabra-js.iconnectionid.md) | The unique ID of the connection. |
|  [onDisconnect](./jabra-js.iconnection.ondisconnect.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Observable&lt;void&gt; | Emits when this connection or its parent connection (if one exists) gets disconnected. |
|  [parentConnectionId?](./jabra-js.iconnection.parentconnectionid.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [IConnectionId](./jabra-js.iconnectionid.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional parameter pointing at a parent connection (if the current connection is established through such a parent connection), e.g. a wireless connection through a Jabra dongle device. |
|  [type](./jabra-js.iconnection.type.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [ConnectionType](./jabra-js.connectiontype.md) | Specifies the how the connection was established, e.g. USB or Bluetooth. |
